original_text: And when the day was now far spent, his disciples came unto him, and said, This is a desert place, and now the time is far passed:
korean_text: 때가 저물어가매 제자들이 예수께 나아와 여짜오되 이 곳은 빈 들이요 날도 저물어가니

sentences.original_text: And when the day was now far spent
and now the time is far passed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 시간이 이미 많이 지났습니다
